promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic sea-snake water-type pokemon wearing golden armor. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or sea-snake. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquadraconis, a a gigantic basic sea-snake water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Bubblebeam, Aqua Boomerang. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "sea-snake", "water" or "Aquadraconis". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, sea-snake-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, gleaming bubble background
generatedDescription: Inhabiting river landscapes, this enormous serpent-like creature mesmerizes with Bubblebeam and stuns prey with Aqua Boomerang.
